name: SolomonEnergyConsultant
0:
”Alexa, open energy consultant”
”Alexa, launch energy consultant”
”Alexa, start energy consultant”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: energy consultant
des:
Solomon Energy Consultant is your go-to Alexa skill for making informed decisions about transitioning to solar and renewable energy solutions. Our skill helps homeowners understand the benefits of switching to renewable energy, provides personalized savings estimates, and offers detailed information on government incentives and rebates. Additionally, users can schedule consultations or calls with energy advisors to get more personalized assistance.

With Solomon Energy Consultant, you can:

Get personalized advice on switching to solar energy.
Estimate your potential savings by switching to renewable energy.
Learn about government incentives and rebates you may qualify for.
Schedule consultations or calls with energy advisors for further assistance.
Whether you're looking to reduce your carbon footprint, save on energy bills, or take advantage of available incentives, Solomon Energy Advisor provides all the information you need to make the best decision for your home and the environment.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
